import React , {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import PageTitle from '../components/pagetitle'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import img from '../assets/images/avt/avt.png' UserProfile.propTypes = { }; async function loginAndFetchData() { try { const response = await fetch("/api/user/profile", { method: "GET", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } const data = await response.json(); console.log(data, response.status); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } } function UserProfile(props) { useEffect(() => { loginAndFetchData(); }, []); const [dataCoinTab] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'User Profile', icon: 'fa-user' }, { id: 2, title: 'Referrals', icon: 'fa-share-nodes' }, { id: 5, title: 'Change password', icon: 'fa-lock' }, ]); const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ nickname: "", email: "", firstname: "", lastname: "" }); const { nickname, email, firstname, lastname } = userInfo; return (
{nickname}

{email}

{ dataCoinTab.map(idx => (
{idx.title}
)) }

); } export default UserProfile;
